mapper.insert: insert into patent_doc_orders( amount, user, create_time) values( #{amount}, #{owner.userId}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id,o.create_time,o.pay_time,o.amount,o.order_status,pm.payment_method_id,pm.payment_method, u.user_id, u.username, u.name FROM patent_doc_orders o LEFT JOIN payment_methods pm ON pm.payment_method_id = o.payment_method JOIN users u ON o.user = u.user_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}
